## ImageCache.registerImage() method

Add an image definition to the global cache. Useful when the image data is already loaded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerImage(mapView: MapView, url: string, imageData: ImageData | ImageBitmap | undefined): ImageItem;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | Specifiy which \[\[MapView\]\] requests the image. |
|  url | string | URL of image. |
|  imageData | ImageData \| ImageBitmap \| undefined | Optional \[ImageData\]\] containing the image content. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ImageItem](./harp-mapview.imageitem.md)
